title: Films To Be Buried With - official teaser trailer
itunes:title: Films To Be Buried With - official teaser trailer
itunes:subtitle: Ladies and gentlemen, here is your host BRETT GOLDSTEIN to run down what to expect from his brand new podcast ‘FILMS TO BE BURIED WITH’, every Thursday from next week!
description:
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you ever so kindly for showing up to the OFFICIAL teaser trailer for the 'Films To Buried With' podcast!


Join your loving and lovable host BRETT GOLDSTEIN (comedian, writer and film obsessive) as he gives you the rundown on what you can expect from the show, the themes and formats and much more besides.


It'll be a grand one folks, and it's so great that you're here for the preview. Be sure to come back for the first episode featuring the marvellous JAMES ACASTER, with a glorious episode of film fun and biographical goodness for you to enjoy.


Thank you kindly and see you next week!


––––– ––––– –––––


THIS WEEK'S LINKS:


• BRETT GOLDSTEIN on TWITTER!

• BRETT GOLDSTEIN on INSTAGRAM!

• TICKETS TO SEE BRETT @ THE EDINBURGH FRINGE!

• 'SUPERBOB' - Brett's 2015 feature film!

• 'CORNERBOYS' with BRETT & SCROOBIUS PIP!


• DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on FACEBOOK

• DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on INSTAGRAM

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/filmstobeburiedwith.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
